attributes.action: Provide flats for MPs instead of expenses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The expenses system is in a mire. Proposals to increase MPs pay is not acceptable; an MP could skimp on accommodation to pocket the money with no accountability, get poor quality rest and lower their performance in the House. Government provided flats eradicate the accommodation expenses problem and ensures MPs enjoy a reasonable standard of accommodation and facilities while in London. It might also provide better value for voters money than hotels, while also taking the load of administering accommodation off the MPs staff.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
